text: Albert Ramsdell Gurney Jr. (November 1, 1930 â€“ June 13, 2017) was an American playwright, novelist and academic. He was known for works including The Dining Room (1982), Sweet Sue (1986/7), Love Letters (1988), and The Cocktail Hour (1988). Gurney died in Manhattan on June 13, 2017, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American playwrights Category:American novelists Category:Academics from New York (state) Category:Writers from Buffalo, New York
title: A. R. Gurney
